meanings.definition: A sedimentary rock composed of ooids.
meanings.sent1: The oolite was smooth and round, like tiny marbles.
meanings.sent2: The oolite formed a unique pattern in the rock.
meanings.sent3: The oolite rolled down the hill, causing a small avalanche of rocks.
meanings.sent4: The oolite in the rock resembled a collection of pearls.
meanings.sent5: The oolite sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A type of limestone formed from ooids.
meanings.sent1: The oolite limestone was used to build sturdy walls.
meanings.sent2: The oolite was crushed to create fine limestone powder.
meanings.sent3: The oolite limestone made the building look like a giant sandcastle.
meanings.sent4: The oolite limestone gleamed in the moonlight, almost glowing.
meanings.sent5: The oolite limestone crumbled easily under pressure, revealing its fragility.

meanings.definition: A small spherical grain found in oolitic limestone.
meanings.sent1: Each oolite was perfectly round and tiny.
meanings.sent2: The oolite grains were tightly packed together in the limestone.
meanings.sent3: The oolite grain jumped out of the rock, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The oolite grain felt like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The oolite grain seemed to dance in the palm of your hand, almost alive.
